item.title: 3.3 Deploying as a Canary Deployment Strategy for DevOps Services
item.description: 3.3 Deploying as a canary deployment strategy for DevOps services Use the Code Repository, Build Pipeline, Trigger, etc. created in 2.2 Deploying with Blue/Green Deployment Strategy of DevOps Service. In this case, we will create a new Deployment Pipeline with only the deployment strategy where changes occur. And change the Deployment Pipeline called in the last step of the Build Pipeline from the old Blue/Green to the Canary Deployment Pipeline.
